abstract: The incident at a Caterpillar plant in the Alps was at least the third time in the last few weeks that French workers have detained their bosses to protest job losses.
snippet: The incident at a Caterpillar plant in the Alps was at least the third time in the last few weeks that French workers have detained their bosses to protest job losses.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Workers at a Caterpillar plant in the French Alps briefly held five of their bosses in a dispute over their severance packages, workers and union officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: Caterpillar Workers Detain Bosses in France
headline.print_headline: Caterpillar Workers Detain Bosses in France
